snippet.title: Europa League scores: Juventus advance, Benfica and Sevilla coast
snippet.description:
Europa League scores: Juventus advance, Benfica and Sevilla coast by Kevin McCauley on Apr 10 2014, 4:59p
FC Porto threw away their advantage quickly, while Juventus and Benfica had little trouble hanging onto the leads they built in the first leg.

snippet.title: UEFA Europa League: The final four will be determined on Thursday
snippet.description:
UEFA Europa League: The final four will be determined on Thursday by Zach Woosley on Apr 9 2014, 4:49p
Juventus, Benfica, FC Porto and FC Basel all hold leads after their quarterfinal first legs, can they finish the job?

snippet.title: UEFA Europa League 2014, quarterfinal preview: Juventus faces tough away test
snippet.description:
UEFA Europa League 2014, quarterfinal preview: Juventus faces tough away test by Zach Woosley on Apr 3 2014, 9:47a
Eight teams remain in the chase for Europe's other major club title.

snippet.title: Paris Saint-Germain vs. Chelsea, 2014 UEFA Champions League quarterfinals: An even contest
snippet.description:
Paris Saint-Germain vs. Chelsea, 2014 UEFA Champions League quarterfinals: An even contest by Jack Sargeant on Mar 21 2014, 11:06a
Paris Saint-Germain's Champions League tie with Chelsea promises to be a tight affair.

snippet.title: UEFA Europa League draw 2014 results: Favorites Juventus get stiff test in the quarterfinals
snippet.description:
UEFA Europa League draw 2014 results: Favorites Juventus get stiff test in the quarterfinals by Kevin McCauley on Mar 21 2014, 8:39a
There aren't any weak teams left in the Europa League, but two of the best have run into each other in the quarterfinals.

snippet.title: Europa League scores: Tottenham fails in comeback bid while Basel collapse
snippet.description:
Europa League scores: Tottenham fails in comeback bid while Basel collapse by Kevin McCauley on Mar 20 2014, 6:13p
Tottenham Hotspur came close to pulling off a surprise comeback against Benfica, but fell short. In Spain, Sevilla made up for their terrible first-leg performance, while Juventus won a battle of...

snippet.title: The strongest ever Champions League last 8?
snippet.description:
The strongest ever Champions League last 8? by Andi Thomas on Mar 20 2014, 9:47a
For the first time in recent memory, Manchester United are the weakest team left in the Champions League. But that's not just down to David Moyes's struggles.

snippet.title: UEFA Europa League, Round of 16 preview: Spots in the quarterfinals are on the line
snippet.description:
UEFA Europa League, Round of 16 preview: Spots in the quarterfinals are on the line by Zach Woosley on Mar 20 2014, 7:19a
The best viewing can be found in Italy during Thursday's Europa League action, as Fiorentina look to pull an upset and Napoli try to come back against Porto.

snippet.title: Paulo Machado's mustache is hot fire
snippet.description:
Paulo Machado's mustache is hot fire by Ryan Rosenblatt on Mar 19 2014, 5:27p
Bow down.

snippet.title: André Villas-Boas to take over as Zenit St. Petersburg head coach
snippet.description:
André Villas-Boas to take over as Zenit St. Petersburg head coach by Jack Sargeant on Mar 18 2014, 10:28a
André Villas-Boas will look to rebuild his reputation in Russia. Zenit announced they have chosen him to replace Luciano Spalletti.
